docs.snippet: HELSINKI, Finland, July 24 (AP) -- Members of the United States track and field team at the Olympic games will participate in meets in six nations before returning home, Dan Ferris, chairman of the post-Olympic competition committee, said today.
docs.lead_paragraph: HELSINKI, Finland, July 24 (AP) -- Members of the United States track and field team at the Olympic games will participate in meets in six nations before returning home, Dan Ferris, chairman of the post-Olympic competition committee, said today.

docs.snippet: HELSINKI, Finland, July 25 -- Horace Ashenfelter won today the fastest 3,000-meter steeplechase race ever run for the United States' twelfth gold medal in track and field and its first Olympic victory ever in this event.
docs.lead_paragraph: HELSINKI, Finland, July 25 -- Horace Ashenfelter won today the fastest 3,000-meter steeplechase race ever run for the United States' twelfth gold medal in track and field and its first Olympic victory ever in this event.
docs.abstract: H Ashenfelter (US) wins 3,000-meter steeplechase, G Rhoden (Jamaica) 400-meter run; M Jackson (Australia) women's 200-meter dash trial heat; illus

headline.main: U. S. Olympian Sets Steeplechase Mark; Ashenfelter Scores Olympic Upset With Fastest Steeplechase Time in History AMERICA OUTRUNS RUSSIAN FAVORITE On the Track and Basketball Court in International Events at Helsinki Yesterday

byline.original: By ALLISON DANZIGSpecial to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: HELSINKI, Finland, July 25 (AP) -- The United States and Russia gained easy victories today in the opening round of the Olympic basketball tournament but the Russians were more impressive.
docs.lead_paragraph: HELSINKI, Finland, July 25 (AP) -- The United States and Russia gained easy victories today in the opening round of the Olympic basketball tournament but the Russians were more impressive.

headline.main: U. S. QUINTET BEATS HUNGARIANS, 66-48; Team Listless in Triumph -Russians More Impressive in Routing Bulgaria

docs.snippet: HELSINKI, Finland, July 26 -- America served up a mixed grill in the Olympic basketball arena today and the result was a tasty victory that sent the United States squad into the semi-finals of the sixteen-team tournament.

headline.main: U. S. Trounces Czechs In Basketball, 72-47; U. S. ROUTS CZECHS ON COURT, 72 TO 47

docs.snippet: HELSINKI, Finland, July 26 -- Bob Mathias paced an American sweep of the gruelling Olympic decathlon event tonight, shattering his own world record and raising to thirteen the number of gold medals taken by the United States in these games.
docs.lead_paragraph: HELSINKI, Finland, July 26 -- Bob Mathias paced an American sweep of the gruelling Olympic decathlon event tonight, shattering his own world record and raising to thirteen the number of gold medals taken by the United States in these games.

headline.main: WORLD RECORD SET; Mathias Keeps Title as Campbell and Simmons Follow in Decathlon

docs.snippet: HELSINKI, Finland, July 27 (AP) -- The United States basketball team won its third straight game in Olympic competition tonight, easily breezing past Uruguay, 57 -- 44, and will meet Russia in the first game of the next round starting tomorrow.
docs.lead_paragraph: HELSINKI, Finland, July 27 (AP) -- The United States basketball team won its third straight game in Olympic competition tonight, easily breezing past Uruguay, 57 -- 44, and will meet Russia in the first game of the next round starting tomorrow.

headline.main: U. S. Trounces Uruguay by 57-44 For Third in Row in Basketball; Kurland Stars With 21 Points as Lovellette Is Benched -- Russia Next American Foe -- Eight Teams Survive at Helsinki

docs.snippet: It was a quiet and uneventful week in the foreign exchanges. British sterling and the Canadian dollar moved narrowly on light dealings.
